fullText: This Sweeney Todd is a thrilling, bloody spectacle that makes the most of its Broadway return, with Josh Groban delivering a surprisingly effective performance as the demon barber.
dtliExcerpt: This Sweeney Todd is a thrilling, bloody spectacle that makes the most of its Broadway return, with Josh Groban delivering a surprisingly effective performance as the demon barber.
bwwExcerpt: In their “A Little Priest,” as elsewhere, the psychosexual drama of Sweeney takes the lead. Sweeney and Lovett are more busy punning by way of foreplay for you to focus much on the class war of the number. Their revenge plot is less a righteous up-yours to those above and more a personal crusade. It’s both, because everything in this musical means many things at once, but placing emphasis on the erotic side sets the production spinning in a particular direction. The sec
